text: Good practice statement 34.As programmes introduce HPV DNA testing, use this test at the woman's next routine screening date regardless of the test that was used at prior screening.In existing programmes with cytology or VIA as the primary screening test, rescreening with the same test should be continued until HPV DNA testing is operational among both the general population of women and women living with HIV.
